name: Damashi Game
storyline:
In a world where the weight of student debt crushes the hopes of the next generation, a shadowy organization known as the Watashi Group preys on the desperation of university students and recent graduates. These young people, drowning under the weight of crushing loans, receive an unexpected invitation: compete in a high-stakes game with a single promise—wipe away all their debt, if they can survive.

But once the participants accept, they are whisked away to an opulent yet eerie abandoned cinema. The massive auditorium, once filled with joyous moviegoers, now serves as the twisted arena for the games. The participants find themselves at the mercy of the Watashi Group, whose masked, enigmatic spectators watch from the shadows, delighting in the unfolding chaos like a grotesque form of entertainment. Behind their elaborately designed masks, these wealthy onlookers bet on the players' fates, relishing in the thrill of deception, betrayal, and survival.

The rules are deceptively simple: complete a series of challenges where only the cunning, ruthless, and manipulative can thrive. Every game is a test of wits, strategy, and trust, where alliances are temporary and betrayal is the norm. As the clock ticks down, participants must navigate the ever-changing landscape of the cinema arena, where even a single mistake can mean elimination—and more than just financial ruin.

To the outside world, the participants have vanished, believed to have run away to escape their burdens. But inside the cinema, they face a far darker reality. Those who win are granted the ultimate prize: freedom from their financial chains. But for the losers, the cost is more than just debt—it’s their very lives.

“In the Damashi Game, the stakes are high, and trust is a luxury you can’t afford. Can you outsmart the others and escape the clutches of the Watashi Group, or will you become just another piece of their twisted spectacle?
summary: A thrilling multiplayer experience where social deception, strategy, and quick thinking are your greatest weapons. Outsmart your opponents and be the last player standing in this intense fight for survival.
